maps.name: Nacht der Untoten
maps.description: The original zombie survival map. Survive endless waves of the undead!

maps.name: Asylum
maps.description: A twisted asylum inspired by Verruckt. Navigate through dark corridors and insane experiments!

maps.name: Blut und Schnee
maps.description: A Nazi chalet in the frozen Alps. Fight the undead in blood-stained snow during WWII!
